changeSet.author: CloudSoft.User1
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO nomenclator_validation( id, name, nomenclator_id, condition_expression, message, validation_order ) VALUES ( nextval('HIBERNATE_SEQUENCE'), 'comisii_sau_gl.data_infiintarii', (select id from nomenclator where code='comisii_sau_gl'), '{attribute4} <= date:currentDateAsNomenclatorAttributeFormat()', 'Data infiintarii trebuie sa fie mai mica sau egala cu data curenta.', 1 );
